name: part_004
file: tmp_いつか吾輩もあの頃のインターネットって言われる日が来るのかな #ラプラス・バースデイ2025 [m8hqs4NMij4]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_004.mov

scenes.description: Performance of the song '拝啓ドッペルゲンガー' (Haikei Doppelganger) in a concert hall setting.
scenes.song_name: 拝啓ドッペルゲンガー

scenes.description: La+ Darknesss standing on a rooftop at sunset, shouting out loud.
Performance of the song '紗痲' (Shama) on a stylized stage with disco floor lights.
Skit in a subway station and inside a train car. La+ Darknesss is complaining and yelling at screens showing her performance.

subtitles.original: 拝啓ドッペルゲンガー
subtitles.english: Dear Doppelganger

subtitles.original: どうもこんにちは君の分身です
subtitles.english: Hello, I'm your doppelganger.

subtitles.original: うわあああああああ！
subtitles.english: Waaaaaaaaaaaaaaa!

subtitles.original: うわあ！
subtitles.english: Waaa!

subtitles.original:
紗痲
作詞・作曲：煮ル果実
subtitles.english:
Shama
Lyrics/Music: Niru Kajitsu

subtitles.original: 邪な通う執事ファム・ファタール
subtitles.english: A wicked, frequenting butler, a femme fatale

subtitles.original: 嘘も搾りジュースは青　夜な夜な夜な
subtitles.english: Even lies are squeezed into blue juice, night after night after night

subtitles.original: 火遊びで遺志する　常套の露が解ける頃
subtitles.english: Leaving a will by playing with fire, when the usual dew dissolves

subtitles.original: 違和感が残業している　空気がぐじゃぐじゃしている
subtitles.english: Discomfort is working overtime, the air is all messed up

subtitles.original: 淡々と頭垂れて　お生に入るわって
subtitles.english: Bowing my head indifferently, saying I'm entering life

subtitles.original: 健幸いってサレンダー　お利口お利口
subtitles.english: Saying health and happiness, then surrender, good girl, good girl

subtitles.original: 適宜的にポジ織り願おたら
subtitles.english: If I wish for positivity in an appropriate manner

subtitles.original: 患う愛を愛と呼べんなら　如何せん僕は古みたい
subtitles.english: If I can't call this ailing love "love", then I guess I'm like an old thing

subtitles.original: 話したいことも無いっていうから　そこで御臨終だ気づいたの？
subtitles.english: Since you say there's nothing to talk about, you're dead right there, did you realize?

subtitles.original: 患う君を肯定したんなら　僕の居場所はどこへやら
subtitles.english: If I affirmed the ailing you, where would my place be?

subtitles.original: じれったい針とファンデーション　舌を曝け出して収まっている
subtitles.english: Irritating needles and foundation, sticking my tongue out and settling in

subtitles.original: 邪な通う執事ファム・ファタール
subtitles.english: A wicked, frequenting butler, a femme fatale

subtitles.original: 嘘も搾りジュースは青　夜な夜な夜な
subtitles.english: Even lies are squeezed into blue juice, night after night after night

subtitles.original: 火遊びで遺志する　常套の露が解ける頃
subtitles.english: Leaving a will by playing with fire, when the usual dew dissolves

subtitles.original: 自称天秤は　おつむが軽い方に軍配を上げた
subtitles.english: The self-proclaimed scales gave the win to the one with the lighter head

subtitles.original: デカダンに唆した手出しを持ってない
subtitles.english: I don't have the hand that enticed with decadence

subtitles.original: 不潔　手脂のように追い堕したか
subtitles.english: Filth, did you drive it away like hand grease?

subtitles.original: 患う愛を愛と呼べんなら　如何せん僕は古みたい
subtitles.english: If I can't call this ailing love "love", then I guess I'm like an old thing

subtitles.original: 話したいわけが無いっていうけど　気付かないわけもないだろうな
subtitles.english: You say there's no way you want to talk, but there's no way you won't notice

subtitles.original: 患う僕の存在理由はさ　患い向き合う愛の影
subtitles.english: My reason for existing in this ailing state is the shadow of love I face

subtitles.original: 腐らんで徒に擦ったなら　しどろもどろになってたわ　もう待って
subtitles.english: If I rubbed it in vain without rotting, I'd be all flustered, wait already

subtitles.original: 患う愛を愛と呼べんなら　如何せん僕は古みたい
subtitles.english: If I can't call this ailing love "love", then I guess I'm like an old thing

subtitles.original: 放さないことも無いっていうから　そこで御臨終だ気づいたの？
subtitles.english: Since you say it's not like I won't let go, you're dead right there, did you realize?

subtitles.original: 患う愛を愛と呼ぶんなら　如何せん僕が嫌みたい
subtitles.english: If you call this ailing love "love", then I guess I'm the one who's disliked

subtitles.original: 終わりのキスも何杯目？　横縞見透かされて収まっている
subtitles.english: How many final kisses has it been? My ulterior motives are seen through, and I'm settling in

subtitles.original: 収まっているさ
subtitles.english: Settling in.

subtitles.original: たけー... スタジオ寒いんだよ
subtitles.english: It's so... the studio is cold.

subtitles.original: ちょっと寒すぎんだろ、このスタジオ、カバーのスタジオは...
subtitles.english: It's a bit too cold, this studio, Cover's studio is...

subtitles.original: え？ たけー... 意味が分からない。
subtitles.english: Eh? It's so... I don't understand.

subtitles.original: ふざけやがって。
subtitles.english: Stop messing with me.

subtitles.original: 椅子は竹串...
subtitles.english: The seats are bamboo skewers...

subtitles.original: てめえか！
subtitles.english: Is it you?!

subtitles.original: てめえかよ！ え？ その腐った根性！
subtitles.english: Is it you?! Eh? That rotten spirit of yours!

subtitles.original: 笑ったね？
subtitles.english: You laughed, didn't you?

subtitles.original: その心笑ってるね？
subtitles.english: You're laughing in your heart, aren't you?

subtitles.original: 悪いけどね、あんたよりよっぽど生きてるんだよ！
subtitles.english: I'm sorry to say, but I'm much more alive than you are!
